website_summaries.verdict: An affordable, high-quality makeup brush set that has every kind of feature you may ever need.
pros: Stands out for its two dozen diverse brushes, wooden handles, animal-friendly materials, and anti-bacterial bristles
cons: The longer haired brushes may shed a little

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy, very poor quality
customer_reviews.text: I seriously discourage any purchase.I was looking for a set of brushes which could be complete so i don't need to keep searching for brushes. i was so disappointed by my purchase. and cannot return because unfortunately i order from Cameroun in Africa and have it shipped to a relative in the US who then sends it to me. After opening the box, i was so impressed, but the brushes had a strong smell of chemicals so i decided to wash and three of the brushes just change texture. two of them had a dark bluish colour that couldn't stop washing out. Really disappointed. Please do not buy these brushes, Shany should upgrade their quality..
customer_reviews.author: Shaitou Cho

customer_reviews.title: ... because of some mixed reviews I read and I'm glad I did
customer_reviews.text: I bought this hesitantly because of some mixed reviews I read and I'm glad I did. I'm not a makeup artist or anything, I just wanted a nice complete set of clean brushes and that's exactly what I got. There is a plastic flap that holds the brushes in place and I suspect this is the cause of the smell I read about in some reviews. I left the set unrolled for a day and it went away. Overall this is a great value for the price of one brush at MAC or Makeup Forever. I noticed a difference in how my look came out after the first use!
customer_reviews.author: Danicka Hildreth

customer_reviews.title: Gets my 15 year old daughter's approval.
customer_reviews.text: After a few months of use from my 15 year old daughter, she washes them out with soap and water, and they are still soft and holding up with little to no wear. She uses them on her and my younger daughter. They love getting dolled up, especially during this self distancing period. It picks up their morale. These brushes are affordable and aces in her book, and as a parent, especially a dad, these are aces in my book as well.
customer_reviews.author: James Banks

customer_reviews.title: Exceptional set, except for one thing...
customer_reviews.text: The brush set came in a very nice box with a guide explaining all the brushes. I like that the brushes also have the brush number and use written on the brush handle itself. The only issue I found was after washing the brushes, the liquid foundation brushes had a lot of fallout from the first wash. I’m hoping this won’t be a continuing issue, but otherwise the brushes and packaging seem exceptional!
customer_reviews.author: fireflye

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Product handles broke after 1.5 weeks. Update 4 weeks later almost 10 handles broke and the feathers on the brushes are coming off.
customer_reviews.author: Neenie

customer_reviews.title: I'm so happy I bought this set!
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical when purchasing these. I had just returned a brush set that was awful from a different maker and wasnt holding my Hopes to high this time. But I was pleasantly surprised. Not only are these brushes soft and amazing to feel, they grabbed the pigment well and applied beautifully. I'm so happy I bought this set. The only issue I found is the placement of brush f71 the xl fan brush. It is set in a fold of pouch, so it arrived with the bristles slightly bent. I have it lying out do hopefully itll straighten back out. But that's the only issue. The packaging is amazing as well, just and over al beautiful brush set!!
customer_reviews.author: Kryssi

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Brushes for Fantastic price
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful and great product. At first I was skeptical, I've only had high end brushes and it was time to renew. The packaging is fantastic, great presentation, I washed the brushes prior to first use and they all retained their shape and no bristle loss AT ALL. Extremely satisfied with the purchase specially because of the great price which I questioned the quality at first. Go for it, worse comes to worse, you didn't spend a few hundred dollars and you can use them for something else.😉
customer_reviews.author: C Merc

customer_reviews.title: Cheap!
customer_reviews.text: Hated these brushes. The brissles are cheap and leave streaks they definitely do not blend well. If I had not used them I would definitely return them. I would definitely not recommend these and I can see now how other reviews said to beware the positive reviews. The seller offers a free gift for a good review. Not interested my review is honest!
customer_reviews.author: Jeanette Jimenez

customer_reviews.title: Brushes are pretty but came damaged
customer_reviews.text: These brushes although beautiful they came with some damaged the bristles were very uneven and smooshed to no repair. Made me so sad as a mother of 6 this is the only passion I have and it takes a considerate amount of time and money to buy a set. I have many other things to pay for so when I see something that takes time yo save up for and wait for in the mail it breaks my heart. Wish it would of came in good condition really had high hopes for this brand read reviews and watched youtube for days before ordering 😔
customer_reviews.author: Carla b.

customer_reviews.title: So far so good!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to replace my years old make up brush set. It has everything I want in brush styles for different types of make up application. I haven’t used them yet but they are very soft and the bristles aren’t falling out. There is a slight odor to them but I’m assuming that’s from the packaging and shipment and manufacturing. So far I’m going to give it a 5 star rating. We will see after a couple months since I only use make up sparingly.
customer_reviews.author: Robert B

customer_reviews.title: THE BEST MAKEUP BRUSHES!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love Shany cosmetics and thought i would try the brushes. I wanted a set that had the description name on them so I could learn what they are to improve my makeup. Not only do the brushes have the name type on them but I also received an instruction manual explaining what they are used for!! I am extremely happy and the quality is amazing!!!! I love this brush set and will buy more again!!
customer_reviews.author: amazonian

customer_reviews.title: First time buying really nice brushes - I love them
customer_reviews.text: Love the feel - they are so soft and well made. Very sturdy and this is my first time buying nice brushes. Normally I get drugstore brands that are itchy and scratchy. These are soft and I now look forward to putting makeup on. I highly recommend these as you get so many brushes for mineral makeup, different contouring brushes, powdered brushes, finishing brushes blending and lining lips and eyes!
customer_reviews.author: mookie

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: I am not great with makeup but I'm trying to do better things for my skin. I got these brushes and was overwhelmed by how nice they were. The insert explaining what they do is very helpful, and each brush is labeled with its type/function. These feel great and they apply makeup beautifully. I have sensitive skin and my face has not yet broken out from any of these brushes. The case is very nice too. I feel kind of ridiculous for buying this when I'm not going to use all these brushes, at least not regularly, but they're worth it. Treat yourself.
customer_reviews.author: NotAWitchProbably

customer_reviews.title: Impressed With This Set
customer_reviews.text: Was skeptical about these brushes, but after reading multiple reviews I decided to purchase the set! I’m so glad I did! They’re very well made, soft, don’t shed, and look absolutely beautiful in person. The set definitely rivals some of my more expensive brushes, I’m so happy with this purchase! There was a factory smell when they first arrived, but If you just wash the brushes and air out the leatherette it will dissipate.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: LOVE UM:)
customer_reviews.text: This is a BIG set of brushes, more large brushes than I was expecting or hoping for, my first time ordering a set. However the set is awesome, I love it, I'm not a big makeup person, I have very long and naturally curly red hair with a med to light complexion and no freckles on my face, I am 55 years old and no wrinkles as of yet:) I was going to return only because I didn't think I would use all these, BUT!! I like them so much I'm keeping them and I am going to have a blast learning how to use each and everyone...
customer_reviews.author: peggy

customer_reviews.title: Great brushes, packaging could be better
customer_reviews.text: Pro’s: nice soft bristles pick up loose, pressed, liquid and cream. Brushes are numbered and labeled. Con’s: some brush bristles arrives bent, they are in a rolled bag. The bag is then protected by a sturdy box. I don’t think this an issue that arises from the transportation of the product but rather the packaging. Im hoping this issue gets resolved. I’d Love to see this set in a stand up easel or in a rolled case that does not need to be tied but closes with Velcro. Those of us that wear makeup typically are pressed for time, I’d like to close and go, instead of tying. Would I purchase again? Absolutely.
customer_reviews.author: lily

customer_reviews.title: They kept breaking
customer_reviews.text: I ended up giving the bigger brushes of the set to my little daughter to play makeup with. The brushes detach from the post constantly. I’ve even tried to hot glue them back into position with no luck. Wouldn’t recommend. Invest a little more money and get a quality set if makeup is something you love.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Nice Brushes and Nice Case
customer_reviews.text: These brushes come very nicely packaged in a heavy duty box. Inside the box, there is a silk like draw string bag that holds the folding pouch that the brushes are stored in. The pouch is leather like and seems to be pretty sturdy. The brushes are very soft and durable. I am very happy with this purchase and would recommend it to anyone in search of a complete set of makeup brushes.
customer_reviews.author: Tgraw

customer_reviews.title: Boom
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my wife for Christmas. She loves it and wants to write a review. Here is my wifes review: Wow! What a great Christmas present. This set comes with a great selection of brush types. I'm very excited to use it. I like the case that the brushes also come in. I haven't used the brushes quite yet, but they feel great to the touch and based on reviews from other websites they should last awhile:)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING!
customer_reviews.text: AMAZING! This assortment of brushes is exactly what I needed after using me MAC brushes for only 2 years they started to break and loose hair. After reading the reviews on this product I decided to replace my set with the SHANY Pro Signature Brush set and I am very impressed by the quality and price. Much better than my more expensive MAC brushes I purchased for triple this price. The packaging was very professional and the brushes came safely inside a black pouch that will come in handy for traveling. The only downside is a very strong chemical smell coming from the box upon opening, but after I washed them gently I can't smell anything anymore. Overall great product!
customer_reviews.author: Alora Funk

customer_reviews.title: I like them...
customer_reviews.text: They were good at first then every time I washed them the hairs fell out, not the best quality!!!
customer_reviews.author: Erika

customer_reviews.title: Great set
customer_reviews.text: I am not receiving a free gift or any type of compensation for writing this review, I am writing this review because I really enjoy all the options of different brushes without spending a fortune. I already spend so much on beauty products, the last thing I want is to buy ONE brush that cost the same as my foundation but I also don't want a brush that can't apply my expensive beauty products nicely. So if you are looking for a great variety and good quality, I would definitely suggest buying this Brush set. Picasso's work was more skill than his brushes anyways, just saying. :)
customer_reviews.author: Chrystal

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and quantity
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my daughter and she loves it! She has high standards for beauty products, so I can attest to the high quality of these brushes. The number of brushes is amazing as well, and it's great that they come in a kit and also a nice box. It is hard to tell that the handles are wood, they are smooth black handles. But that's fine. Each brush is labeled with the expected usage for that brush, which is very helpful as well. A brochure is also included to explain the brushes. Excellent gift!
customer_reviews.author: N. Cal shopper

customer_reviews.title: Nice Quality - Best Value
customer_reviews.text: Brushes are of great quality. Both natural bristles and synthetic are of nice quality. Some of the synthetic bristles fall out on the first few uses. Particularly F10. Overall it was a great value and great product. I would recommend. I would buy from this brand again.
customer_reviews.author: Angela Spencer

customer_reviews.title: Great for begginers.
customer_reviews.text: The brushes are so soft, but they pick up makeup really well. I looove the mineral brushes. They are just what I needed for my bare minerals loose powder make up. They make application easier than the brushes they provide you and a lot more affordable. For the price of one or two brushes you get 24! Only things I didn't like was: the placement of the fan brush which makes it bend when stored (but i just moved it, easy fix), and also some of the eyeshadow brushes are bigger than I'd like them to be. However, I still love this set for their face brushes.
customer_reviews.author: LDM

customer_reviews.title: Great brushes at a great price!
customer_reviews.text: Love the collection of brushes and the explanation of use for each brush. As someone that has always used my fingers, it’s nice for a little education until I am skilled with brushes. My only reason for not giving 5 stars is some of the brushes, specifically the foundation brushes, shed quite a bit and get stuck to skin because of the liquid foundation. For the price I am not dissatisfied because of this, but still a minor con in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Staley

customer_reviews.title: YAAAS BRUSH SET
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this brush set. I've been using them for just a little bit but I can tell with the extensive types of brushes that I will be able to piece together insane cosmetic looks and I am extremely excited to try them! This set consists of phenomenal versatile trust heads at such an amazing price! I absolutely love it! Unfortunately, while I was cleaning them out, one brush in particular (M33 Mineral Powder Brush) slipped out of its handle and its completely destroyed so DO BE CAREFUL ABOUT HOW YOU CLEAN THEM! These brushes are delicate. That being said, They're still an essential buy for any make up enthusiast or aspiring pro! I highly recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: Alex Hudson

customer_reviews.title: Great, Great Brush Set!!!
customer_reviews.text: Really awesome brush set. My set didn't shed very much at all. However, even the most expensive brush set sheds some. The brushes are soft yet firm enough to hold product. They apply product to your face soft and smoothly without streaking. Your face has such a beautiful finished look to it after using these brushes. Stop using fingers, sponges and less then adequate brushes and move up to this wonderful brush set! It is far better then many, many of some of the expensive sets I've used. I would purchase again in a heart beat! Great price for such awesome brushes!!!
customer_reviews.author: Sheree Voshell

customer_reviews.title: Great brushes at a great price
customer_reviews.text: I used to buy makeup brushes from Sephora and now I'm pissed I didn't find this SHANY Pro Brush Set earlier, I could've saved so much money! Pros: - Soft and dense bristles - Good variety of brushes - Nice packaging Cons: - Handles are a little fat for my liking (but nothing to worry about) - Could do with a little more variety of sizes for small eyeshadow brushes - New brushes smell a little of chemicals (again no big deal because it can be aired out) Honestly there really aren't any cons...I definitely recommend to everyone!
customer_reviews.author: SDSDSDSD

customer_reviews.title: Good quality for price
customer_reviews.text: I think these are great brushes for the price! They're soft, apply makeup evenly, and come with a nice roll up case. I've never really worn much makeup and I wanted to start and I these brushes are perfect for a novice like me. They rarely shed and I like that they are a mix of real and synthetic hairs. My only small complaint was a couple of the brush heads detached from the handle not long after I started using then. I just reattached them with a little glue and they're as good as new. Not a big deal at all and an easy fix.
customer_reviews.author: Melina Coe

customer_reviews.title: GREAT PRODUCT!!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for some brushes for my girlfriend. I came across these SHANY brushes. They had great reviews so I took a chance on them and she LOVED them. PROS: They are really soft, easy to clean and they don't shed as some people have mentioned. CONS: They smell like plastic/paint when you first open them up but if you leave them out for a day or two, it will go away. DEFINITELY RECOMMEND THIS PRODUCT TO FAMILY AND FRIENDS!!!
customer_reviews.author: N-I-C-K

customer_reviews.title: Some bristles came out on first use
customer_reviews.text: I really like the brushes but using them for the first time, some of the bristles were coming out when applying my foundation. Had to pick them off after I had applied my makeup. A few of the bigger brushes are a little thin, but the smaller ones such as the eyeshadow brushes are really nice.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love, love
customer_reviews.text: Love, love, love this set! The brushes are all so soft. I would rate them right up there with MAC or Stigma. It is packaged very nicely, and has a nice roll-up pouch for travel. The insert also has instructions for each little guy in there!! I would definitely give as a gift. you can't beat such quality for such an amazing price!!
customer_reviews.author: Kindawg

customer_reviews.title: LOVE LOVE LOVE THIS SET!!
customer_reviews.text: It has everything. It comes packaged very nice in a box with a velvet bag. It has every brush you could want and they are labeled with what they are for, which helps an amateur like me. Brushes are of great quality for the price. You can't beat it. One of my favorite purchases.
customer_reviews.author: Amber Rhoads

customer_reviews.title: the feel the look just screams high end but for a great price. The fan brush is SO soft and ...
customer_reviews.text: These brushes.....❤️❤️❤️❤️❤️❤️ Everything single detail they added makes the purchase worth it. The packaging, the range of colors in the brushes, the feel the look just screams high end but for a great price. The fan brush is SO soft and full. Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Buy buy buy.  You won’t be disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Brushes are amazing it’s a must buy. I wrote a review prior to this but don’t think it went through. If I have two reviews sorry about that. However this set is amazing and I encourage you to buy. I love my Morphe brushes and these are comparable. They are better then my IT brushes. Shany, thank you for unbeatable price for an unbeatable quality.
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: I was soo impressed with this brush set; it ...
customer_reviews.text: I was soo impressed with this brush set when I opened it; it comes with a blending brush which is personally what I was looking for and the brushes are so soft and they look professional. However, the 2 thick stippling brushes sheds ALOT and the dye from the black bristles is very thick and it always squeezes out every time I wash them. I soaked them overnight and the dye still wrings out of the brushes--and this is just from cleaning them. Plus I had to pull out a couple of shedded hairs from the buffed bronzer brush. I haven't had a problem with the other brushes yet, but those 2 stippling brushes are a bit of a problem.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great quality for the price. Very soft brushes. I love the brush guide that’s included for beginners. Great roll up punch with compartments for traveling. Very happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Matt and Jessica F.

customer_reviews.title: Big Bang for your Buck
customer_reviews.text: When first opened, the smell of plastic is quite overwhelming, however leaving the wrap/case outside for a couple of days left it smelling fine, and there's no residual smell on the brushes. I was astounded at the quality of these brushes, considering the price. They wash well, with almost no shedding, and the sturdy handles feel nice and weighty in the hand. A quality set I would definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love these brushes!
customer_reviews.text: These brushes are amazing, They come in a great leatherette that keeps them clean and organized. The whole set came with the an instruction sheet that shows how to use every brush which was nice. The only negative to these brushes wasthat my F71 XL fan brush was bent at the bristles and frayed due to how the leatherette was wrapped. Everything else was perfect and the other brushes worked flawlessly. Would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Samantha medina

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Brushes
customer_reviews.text: Loving these brushes! Great value for the price and love the weight of the wooden handles. Bristles barely shed at all and the quality of the fibers in the brush bristles are lovely! I’m very happy with this purchase and love the versatility of all the different brush types. I also really like that they are labeled with their use and that there is a booklet with descriptions for each brush.
customer_reviews.author: liz r

customer_reviews.title: So thick'
customer_reviews.text: I haven't got to try it yet however.. Love the thickness of the brushes. It looks like you paid $100 for this but damn it's only 40 bugs! Worth buying '' Update: So I tried this and it works amazing. There is no pieces of the brush that falls off. I bought a shany brush set before but it was a lot cheaper than this one. The hairs falls off like crazy. It was all over my makeup and my face. This is definitely a good purchase and I'm so happy!
customer_reviews.author: CA

customer_reviews.title: ... once for a friend because I was so in love with them I had to pass it on
customer_reviews.text: I have actually purchased this product twice once for my self and once for a friend because I was so in love with them I had to pass it on. I have had these brushes since 2015 and use a lot of them daily and they are still in perfect condition!
customer_reviews.author: Maci Disotell

customer_reviews.title: A review after 2 months of use
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this brush set for 2 months now and I feel they have now earned this positive review. The brush hairs are full and soft. The handles are sturdy and labeled to inform you of their use. Only 2 of the brushes shed and it was only a few hairs the very first time I used them. I have washed them several times already and they have held up nicely and returned to their original shape and feel each time. I recommend this brush set for anyone looking to have a full, sturdy set of makeup brushes for a great price.
customer_reviews.author: TheRealJJ

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy
customer_reviews.text: Pro: Great for MUA building there makeup brushes and for beginners brush quality is great for the price worked better than anticipated. Came with a brush bag was very nicely boxed and has labels on each brush for what to use it for! Apply pretty okay its like in the real techniques range of application Cons:: None
customer_reviews.author: Marcos Mayorga Zamora

customer_reviews.title: Amazing brushes
customer_reviews.text: Very beautiful and great quality also came a week early, only downside it the foundation brushes have a tremendous amount of bristles that fall out but every other brush it perfect
customer_reviews.author: jocelyn

customer_reviews.title: FANTASTIC
customer_reviews.text: These brushes are absolutely amazing. DEFINITELY worth the price. I've been using them for about a week now and my makeup looks flawless every single day. My favorite brush is the big white bronzer brush. It blends so amazingly and so effortlessly. all of the brushes are fantastic. I'm definitely more experienced with makeup and makeup brushes, but this is an amazing kit for even a beginner. Super awesome quality and they shipped very quickly! I would DEFINITELY recommend!
customer_reviews.author: bobbievanityy

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy these cheap things
customer_reviews.text: Wouldn't recommend. These brushes shed too much and cannot be cleaned without breaking. The eye shadow brushes hold up but if you have a daily liquid foundation routine non of the brushes hold up for very long. Half of the bristles in my flat foundation brush ripped out when i was cleaning it off with a tissue and the other bushes are just falling apart all together. Two brushes are coming apart at the handle. Waste of money. These bushes are amazing and exciting at first and I think that is when most reviews are written. Started having problems at the start of the second month owning them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous, cruelty-free brushes
customer_reviews.text: Based on how inexpensive the brush set was, I assumed it would only last a few weeks. However, I've been using these for six months now, and they are fabulous. The range of shapes of brushes are impressive; there really is a brush for anything you might want to try. I especially like that there are several different foundation brushes depending on the shape and type of makeup used and to make it easy, each brush has its purpose on the side.The quality is great, they're durable, AND they are cruelty-free. I will not go back to those ridiculously expensive brushes--whenever these do start to wear out.
customer_reviews.author: MES

customer_reviews.title: So soft!
customer_reviews.text: I really enjoy these brushes. They are my first set of brushes that I have ever bought and they work wonderfully. For a set of 24 pieces each brush has a fully individual look. Surprisingly the colors on the brushes are absent and they don't cause any transfer at all. I use them on myself and also my mother and sister. They both say that they are very soft and I agree completely.
customer_reviews.author: aure-damr

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product! Def worthwhile.
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these. I am so happy with this order. First it arrives in an awesome keepsake box, there is a slight smell once you open but I think it is from being sealed. Everything was like opening a great big present. Then these brushes are all individually wrapped in a nice bag. I gotta say presentation was amazing. The brushes are super soft. I am so excited!
customer_reviews.author: Wifeandmomof3

customer_reviews.title: a definate win
customer_reviews.text: Love these brushes, way more quality than i was expecting. wasn't sure about ordering them because i work in the beauty industry and was told i needed to spend high amounts on brushes for them to be good. Well that defiantly isn't the case at all. So happy that i took the chance and purchased these. I highly recommend them, comes with a very large selection. Love that because i have separate brushes for dark and light shadows ect.... Great selection.
customer_reviews.author: nailmom

customer_reviews.title: The brushes are soft and nice. They are full size
customer_reviews.text: The brushes are soft and nice. They are full size, very thick. There is a bit of shedding, but very minimal. Very nice. Update: 12/18/15 Just getting a chance to give this update. The flat top foundation brush sheds like crazy. I spend half my time applying foundation and the other half picking off the brush bristles. Had to get another foundation brush.
customer_reviews.author: NHLLGN

customer_reviews.title: I am pleased with these
customer_reviews.text: I am pleased with these. Most cosmetics come with crummy applicators. These work well with my mineral foundation,blush and eyeshadow. I haven't played with the liquid foundations yet. Why I really bought them is a little secret ( shhh don't tell).Most of these brushes work beautifully with artists pastels. Since one pastel brush runs twenty dollars and up, I'm just too pleased how well these work. (Shhush don't tell)
customer_reviews.author: Linda T.

customer_reviews.title: The brushes are really soft and pretty. I kind of underestimated the use for all ...
customer_reviews.text: The brushes are really soft and pretty. I kind of underestimated the use for all of them and still aren't sure how to use all of them, but I'm really glad that it came with instructions because I am absolutely useless when it comes to makeup. Pros so many brushes you don't know which to use first soft you can take them anywhere the leather pouch is a plus INSTRUCTIONS Cons I noticed one or two brushes to be a little rougher than the others, but they might be like that for a reason?? I'm not really an expert, other than that I'm pretty satisfied and would recommend to family and friends.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wow! Great brushes...and a LOT of them for a GREAT price!
customer_reviews.text: Wow, really surprised at how many brushed you get and now nice these brushes are for the price! They even come in a nice box and in a leatherette sleeve with a spot for each brush. I would have expected at least triple the price for what you get! They quality seems nice soo far, I've been using them for a few days now! REALLY impressed!!
customer_reviews.author: J. Strickland

customer_reviews.title: Mother's Day Went GREAT!
customer_reviews.text: My girlfriend has been trying to get better at makeup trying to "contour" or whatever and I keep seeing her watch videos saying things like "F***!" and I'll say what, and she'll say "I need this brush... I need all these brushes!" And so I went to Amazon, found these pretty little numbers right away, showed her a picture, came the next day, and she can't stop thanking me every morning and she's been looking even more beautiful than usual. These brushes are beautiful and they feel great in her little hand and doesn't leave any brush strokes. Girlfriend is happy she got some quality brushes! Must buy, must have!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product
customer_reviews.text: I know these brushes are for more advanced makeup artist and I'm a beginner but I just love how you guys have a brochure that provides information about all the brushes and their usage. This allows me to better understand what I'm doing without being so confused. Inlove with the package and I just can't wait to use it on Tuesday for me and my husband special day.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I Love These Brushes!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice brushes. Wash them before use with alittle Dawn dish soap and olive oil, rinse, then dip them in alittle hair conditioner and rinse again. You can see how to do it on YouTube. Try not to get water down into the barrel and dry them tilted downward. I think these brushes will give years of use and pleasure if you take care of them. I love them.
customer_reviews.author: VSkye

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely Awesome
customer_reviews.text: I love it! It is incredibly good quality for the outstanding affordable price. I love the brush descriptions on the actual brushes, and the small instructional manual. My makeup is definitely applied better and as a result looks a hundred times better! If I could change just one thing, that would be the shedding of the liquid foundation brush. It is a little bothersome having to peel small hairs all over your face from the brush. However other than that the brushes are super pretty to have on display on the vanity and just really good quality. The packaging is simply luxurious and I am obsessed with the softness of the brushes. Awesome purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Better than anything I've used before !
customer_reviews.text: Just received my brush set I have got to say I am in love with this product!!! It arrived in like 2 days which was so awesome! Once o received it I was so impressed by the packaging it arrived shrink wrapped and so tightly packaged to avoid any damages! I loved the fact that it has its own guide and tells you what brush is for what! I definitely recommend these! They did not shed at all!!! So in love !
customer_reviews.author: Dayze

customer_reviews.title: For the price its a great choice.
customer_reviews.text: I've had this set for a few months now and can't complain. Two of the brushes have broken from drops, but some hot glue fixed them right up. Almost no fall out and I'm still trying to find ways to use some of them. For the price its a great choice.
customer_reviews.author: Bryar B.

customer_reviews.title: Great brush set
customer_reviews.text: I love this brush set! There are so many brushes that come with this, all for so many different things. I never thought I'd find an affordable set that included every brush I needed, plus some. I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: kelbelle

customer_reviews.title: Great Set!!
customer_reviews.text: Super great group of brushes and feel . It does have a strong order but it doesn’t pick up eyeshadows good well. The foundation brush is amazing .
customer_reviews.author: Frascamr

customer_reviews.title: This brush set is amazing!! It includes every brush you could need ...
customer_reviews.text: This brush set is amazing!! It includes every brush you could need and all of them are super soft and great quality. I haven't had any bristle shedding with these like I do with some other brands. The brush holder is well made, a perfect size for traveling, and I love the extra pockets in it. This whole set is super affordable and definitely worth it!
customer_reviews.author: kaiterade

customer_reviews.title: Still great!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these brushes during the holiday season of 2015 and they still work great! Some did shed but I expected that. Great variety for the price and they're made well. Like I said, I bought mines almost 3 years ago and they're still getting the job done.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney Deann

customer_reviews.title: ... set i got her - and the packaging is amazing.. not only a nice box them come ...
customer_reviews.text: My wife is in heaven with this set i got her - and the packaging is amazing.. not only a nice box them come in, but a roll-out holder for each piece, and a snazzy bag to roll up the holder and put these back into
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I had not bought any brushes in a while since i was in love with my old one
customer_reviews.text: I bought these brushes for me. I had not bought any brushes in a while since i was in love with my old one, but unfortunately they needed to go. I love the quality of these brushes. The price is so worth it. They have a very strong handle and have a very soft bristle. As for right now i have not had any problem with them and they have done their job nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Aidee Avila

customer_reviews.title: Amazing brushes!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE these brushes. They’re soft, not prickly. I love how it comes with every size brush imaginable, and was pleasantly surprised that it came in a travel pouch, inside a nice velvet string bag, inside a nice box. I also love that the product came with a paper guide that labels what brush is for what, perfect for beginners, and with quality that even pros will love.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Delacruz

customer_reviews.title: Great brushes!!
customer_reviews.text: this are great brushes. I use most of them every time I put my makeup on. they are extremely soft and well made. no bristles fall out and they work really well. I would recommend these brushes and for the price they are really worth it. I love the packaging. the box they come in is really nice and all the brushes are in the really nice case and are wrapped in plastic. Some of the bigger brushes have clear plastic bristles covers which is really nice.
customer_reviews.author: Gigi

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality and zero service.
customer_reviews.text: I'm very disappointed. Upon receipt, two of the brushes shed a lot of hair and the black/blue dye came off all over my face. Even after several wasings this was still the case. On another one of the brushes the whole set of bristles came out from the wand after only a few uses. I've tried 3 times to ask Shany to replace the brushes. They had me send them photos of the brushes and my amazon receipt. They've never responded. I called two more times and nothing. I want a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... two stars because there are a few brushes I like. I threw away several right off the bat ...
customer_reviews.text: Only giving two stars because there are a few brushes I like. I threw away several right off the bat because they were so stiff they scraped.my makeup off. The coating handles are peeling off after only a month
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: GREAT!
customer_reviews.text: BEAUTIFUL PACKAGING! the brushes are so soft and stylish. It took me a while to find these brushes because the functionality and styling was very important to me. I need pretty to make me look pretty. My only complaint is that they didn't have a designated lip brush and generic blush brush. But there are other brushes that will take care of the job. And they didn't shed much when I washed them. Good job! Great brushes!
customer_reviews.author: Love a Good Book!

customer_reviews.title: Excellent set!
customer_reviews.text: Absolute steal! Excellent quality for the price! Must have in make up collection!
customer_reviews.author: Giving Back XO

customer_reviews.title: Extremely pleased and highly recommended!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great set of makeup brushes! Very nice quality and great for many styles of makeup application. I am very pleased with this purchase and highly recommend it whether you are a professional looking for a nice variety or just wanting to have a variety of brushes for a variety of makeup applications. Definitely a good product!
customer_reviews.author: pam jankowski

customer_reviews.title: Stunning!
customer_reviews.text: These brushes are absolutely amazing!! They are incredibly inexpensive but they have professional salon quality! I use makeup brushes constantly but they've always left stray hairs on my face, broken, or are hard to clean. Shany's 24pc set is an absolute godsend, they are made well, don't shed, come with an adorable leatherette, easy to clean, provide detailed use instructions, and follow PETA's strict guidelines. I love love love them! Only com would be the slight smell when opening them for the first time but it goes away so quickly it really doesn't matter. I would certainly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Emma Sheeler

customer_reviews.title: These brushes are pretty awesome for the price
customer_reviews.text: This is the first real set of brushes I have purchased since owning a few odd ball brushes here and there. These brushes are pretty awesome for the price. I have watched a lot of YouTube videos on makeup and brushes and most of them recommend the expensive brands. Although they may be good I refuse to pay the price. These brushes are priced just right for what you get. The only thing I had a slight issue with is with the liquid foundation brush. The black pieces would sometimes fall off the brush and to my face. No big deal really, just picked it offm other than that these are a great set of brushes for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Erin M. Roark

customer_reviews.title: Amazing SHANY Brush Set!
customer_reviews.text: I received this SHANY brush set in a very nice and beautiful box. The whole unboxing experience was really wonderful and I love the box so much! The set came with a very detailed instruction for each brush and I found it super helpful as I have never used that many different brushes for my make up before. Each brush is also printed with the name and that's really great for me to get familiarized with these brushes. The hair for all the brushes is super soft and seems to be with high quality. Overall I am super happy with the purchase and I am confident I can use this brush set for a long time.
customer_reviews.author: S.L.

customer_reviews.title: What a Wonderful Set!!
customer_reviews.text: I love my new set!! I have always purchased MAC brushes and wanted to try something new with out breaking my bank, after many many reviews I found SHANY!!! Their Pro signature set is not there cheapest but with the variety on natural fibers as well as synthetics for my liquids, HOW COULD I SAY NO! I am so glad I did not pass these beauties by, I am so happy to add this set to my collection!!
customer_reviews.author: Jei

customer_reviews.title: They are good quality. But
customer_reviews.text: This brush set has almost all the brushes you need for a full makeup session. They are good quality. But, I would have preferred it if it came with a cylinder box (for storage) with cover for easy reach and everyday usage.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The absolute best makeup brushes around
customer_reviews.text: These are the best makeup brushes. Exceptional quality, easy to clean, the makeup application is superb.
customer_reviews.author: Melly Grivas Dahlberg

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely love my brushes
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love my brushes!!! I have been wanting to buy new brushes for awhile and just did not want to spend the money that most brushes cost. When I saw these brushes was a little nervous about ordering them offline and not knowing how they would feel, but am so glad did. They are very soft and apply makeup great. The price is also great so win win. Brushes in the past were rough and would hurt my eye lids when applying eye shadow, these do not. I have had these brushes for a week and still loving them. I would recommend these to anybody for makeup.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely amazing-for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Ok, let's get critical for my fellow beauty lovers, these brushes are not perfect but the quality is very good. There are better brushes on the market, however they are twice the price of this whole set for one brush. No shedding, soft (but firm enough to distribute product) and do the job. You will not find a set with anywhere near the quality and quantity of this set anywhere near the price point, you'd be looking into the hundreds. The leatherette set smells like nail polish remover when you get it, but it will air out in a couple hours. Absolutely recommend for my beauties on a budget.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor Barnett

customer_reviews.title: I love these brushes
customer_reviews.text: This is a great value!! I’m so happy with my purchase and the brushes are magic! I have tried them all but have added them to my holy grail
customer_reviews.author: Kersha

customer_reviews.title: I did alot of research and happy I chose this Shany set
customer_reviews.text: I have a 5 piece brush set from mary kay that costed the same as this 24 piece. I did alot of research and happy I chose this Shany set. Its awesome and applies my makeup flawlessly. I didn't think I needed so many brushes but they all do so many different things that you will use more then you think. Also the packaging was very nice and elegant. Just to add these brushes quality is way better then the mary kay brushes I used. Im in LOVE with my Shany brushes.
customer_reviews.author: Santiago

customer_reviews.title: in a very classy leather bag both good quality, i was kind of a afraid for ...
customer_reviews.text: wow no words a girl and cosmetic artist dream come true asome brushes it comes in a elegant box with instruccions for each brush , in a very classy leather bag both good quality , i was kind of a afraid for by sincere since i got a 12 set before from other brand that were very bad quality and the ones in sephora were tooo expensive for me . Since this had so many good postings on it that i decided to try so worth every penny of it and much more very good quality.
customer_reviews.author: sandra Pedraja

customer_reviews.title: Great Brushes
customer_reviews.text: I love the fact that these brushes are both natural and synthetic. Each one works perfectly form its purpose. Great application.
customer_reviews.author: Kiki Waters

customer_reviews.title: Great quality. Still love my Kat Von D brushes
customer_reviews.text: Great quality. Still love my Kat Von D brushes, but for the price this is better than buying a whole set of a designer brand.
customer_reviews.author: Jess Hsiao

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, and a good price.
customer_reviews.text: I was kind of hesitant about buying these as the price was too good to be true. However, they are fantastic for the price. If you don't want to break the bank you need these brushes! A++
customer_reviews.author: mystified

customer_reviews.title: This is an amazing collection of brushes for the value
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing collection of brushes for the value. It even comes with the names of what they are used for listed on the brush and on an included cheatsheet. Very well packaged.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: as far as it coming with a card asking for good reviews for free gift
customer_reviews.text: I think these are exceptional for the price point! They do shed, but they're tough brushes. And, as far as it coming with a card asking for good reviews for free gift, as a previous review stated. Mine came with no such card. I don't like the leatherette case. It's crap, but again, for the price, these are really great ESPECIALLY for someone beginning to explore the makeup world.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Huggins Grant

customer_reviews.title: Love Them!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful! They also come with a guide that tells you what each brush is used for. That "guide" is also on each brush, so you won't use it for the wrong application. Love them! Excellent quality!
customer_reviews.author: flsunsets

customer_reviews.title: Great product/selection
customer_reviews.text: Love, love, love these brushes! They come numbered and described for us novice users. Soft, durable, easy to care for, will use again and again.
customer_reviews.author: Candace F.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing purchase!
customer_reviews.text: The brushes are great quality and you cannot beat the price. I just use them for myself (read: I'm not a makeup artist, so I can't speak to "professional quality"), but I have loved playing around with them and trying out new things. There's almost too many brushes as I am not sure what all of them need to be used for, but it comes with an instruction sheet so I'm just trying it all out.
customer_reviews.author: Caroline

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love these brushes
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love these brushes, they are high end quality and you can't go wrong for the price. 2 of my old Sephora brushes would cost this much. I have had the set for a few months and they have held up like new, wash well and great number of options. They were referred to me by a makeup artist and she uses them on her clients, I also recommend them to friends
customer_reviews.author: Marissa C

customer_reviews.title: Super soft
customer_reviews.text: Great brushes, and pretty carbon black handles. Comes with faux leather case, and the package it comes in is sturdy and nice for additional storage uses. The brushes don't appear to shed, and are individually labeled for reference. I look forward to using them to judge their wear.
customer_reviews.author: Justine Dauenhauer

customer_reviews.title: great brush set for an even better price
customer_reviews.text: wooooowww!!!if your looking at this product and considering it save yourself some time and go with these brushes!great brush set for an even better price!!soooo soft!!no shedding and ive cleaned all of them with my brush cleaner and still no shedding and no loss of its quality!
customer_reviews.author: Erin Gardner

customer_reviews.title: FELL IN LOVE WITH SHANY
customer_reviews.text: OMG guys this is the best brushes ive ever come across they are so soft. they are ALL the brushes you would need in one set , I wouldn't go and buy any other brushes anymore else and if I wanted to I would buy them from Shany. I wish I knew this whole makeup brand along time ago, I also bought shany eye and lip primer and it was so worth it and also the masterpiece 7 layers all in one makeup set. And nothing has let me down. I'm so happy with everything I got from Shany. From now on I am a shany believer and a true follower. AMAZING STUFF AMAZING MAKEUP LINE :) ..
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME BRUSHES
customer_reviews.text: This is a wonderful, soft set of brushes! I've washed them several times now and no shedding or fading. They still look and work great! Depending on what you need it for, the fan brush is HUGE. I have big cheek bones and I love it, but if your face is more petite, you may want to buy a separate, thinner fan brush for highlighting.
customer_reviews.author: Lola

customer_reviews.title: It was really nice.. I am a make up artist and ...
customer_reviews.text: I ordered them yesterday and I got them today.. It was really nice.. I am a make up artist and I know that they will do the task. The only thing that I disliked was the smell of the box and the makeup brush holder... it smelled like paint.. but other than that.. I find these brushes are amazing. I have bought to the low end up to the high end of makeup brushes, and I find these are good for the cost. The brushes are soft to the touch.. and they seem sturdy. So I would recommend these to anyone who is in a budget and want good brushes.
customer_reviews.author: john e corvette

product_meta.title: SHANY The Masterpiece Pro Signature Brush Set - 24pcs Handmade Natural/Synthetic Bristle with Wooden handle
product_meta.description: Our team of professional makeup artists has designed a professional brush set like no other. Made with a premium blend of Premium Sable,Goat badger hair, Pony hair and microfiber bristles, these brushes are soft, resilient and long-lasting. During our unique design process, we tested and selected over 220 brushes. Only 24 of those brushes made our final cut and became the Signature Collection. The Signature Collection is specially designed for the professional makeup artist or makeup enthusiast who wants their most essential brushes in one beautiful, convenient set. With oak and rosewood handles and a sleek, black finish, these brushes are the ultimate in sophistication. Each set includes a faux leatherette for keeping your brushes in great condition at home and during travel. With hypoallergenic, antibacterial-treated bristles, these brushes will also help you avoid breakouts. Create flawless makeup looks with the one and only Signature Collection from SHANY. Read the instruction inside follow the steps to get a Free Mini Brush Cleanser from SHANY.
feature_bullets: Hair materials : Sable, Goat, Badger, Pony , Synthetic Laser Cut Microfiber - All Handmade
Oak wood handle, Anti-Bacterial treated bristles - Collection of 24 most essential brushes
Our best seller cosmetics brush set comes in an elegant travel makeup storage box & rollup pouch
After each use, clean brushes with SHANY Brush Detox Cleanser
Designed in USA with team of Makeup artists & fans, Proud member of PETA and against animal cruelty.

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
